branchCategory.name: AW
branchCategory.description: <p>Filter/Regulator combination minimizes space and&nbsp; piping by integrating the 2 units into one. Standard&nbsp; features include a relieving regulator, which can be quickly&nbsp; locked by pushing down on the adjustment knob. There are&nbsp; many options, which include gauges, auto-drain, metal bowl&nbsp; and covers, different set pressures, etc.&nbsp; 90-AW is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing.</p>

branchItem.name: 90-AW30-60, AW Filter/Regulator Combination
branchItem.description: <p>Filter/Regulator combination minimizes space and  piping by integrating the 2 units into one. Standard  features include a relieving regulator, which can be quickly  locked by pushing down on the adjustment knob. There are  many options, which include gauges, auto-drain, metal bowl  and covers, different set pressures, etc.  90-AW is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing.</p>
